full_text: Michael Anthony Thalbourne, Ph.D.  was an Australian psychologist and parapsychologist. He was educated at the University of Adelaide and the University of Edinburgh. His books include: A glossary of terms used in parapsychology , The common thread between ESP and PK , and Parapsychology in the Twenty-First Century: Essays on the future of Psychical Research . He was first cousin twice removed on his mother's side of Supreme Court of South Australia judge George Coutts Ligertwood.
title: Michael Thalbourne
